body: Top story on MediaGuardian Prince Harry and Pippa Middleton ‘secret romance’ story ruled misleadingDaily Star article criticised by watchdog days after it said Sun’s ‘Queen backs Brexit’ headline was inaccurate More on MediaGuardian First Cornish TV ad to air weeks after language funding is axedFamily-run ice cream company will launch a prime-time ad featuring Kernewek, under threat following government cuts Today’s headlines The GuardianVinyl boom sees LP revenues outstrip YouTube for UK acts.
